message.body: Hi! When do you think you'll be in Philly? I cleared up a second laptop that I thought could work as a server, if I switch my account? Let me know if you'll be around so I can get your help setting it up and we can talk $$ :)
lol that makes no sense but yea ill hopefully make it to philly the weekend of the 19th
Oh ok help meeeee hahaha
I don't know anything about network stuff but thought maybe I could just run it off my old lap!?? Anyway weekend of 19th sounds good

I cleared out my old Mac completely and downloaded indexexhibit and the apple osx server on it and then figured this allows you to move the data and move it to my server? No? Obv for $ for your time but am I totally approaching this wrong?
Should I just start from scratch? I don't mind just re setting it up myself if you think it's easiest
lol ur all twisted
Lol oh
i understood ur texts u just have no clue what ur talking about. go make ur own hosting acct on justhost. then email me ur login info and ill do the rest. whats the rush?
I'm starting a business :)
Have the cards printed, clients etc.
so u r going to build ur own website? id recommend looking into squarespace before buying hosting
I wanted to first just clean up the urls to mine
And use a sub section of my site
I just don't want to have to bug you every time I do something like this
For example
Cleaning up the urls
So I just want to take it off your hands ASAP
But also want to give you $$ obv
Bc I know it's a pain.
But I need my site perfect bc my business is blowing up so it's something I wanted to do in next few days
Which is why I wanted to just do it myself - so I can leave you alone lol
yea but u have no idea how that works and ud have to build a site once u make a sub-domain... which is not easy. if u want something fast and professional use squarespace
i promise ull be saving urself a lot of headache
Hmm you might be right but right now I just need my site either perfect or DOWN and to start it over
I need that ASAP so maybe just take it down completely then
